name: Solar (Li_Macc)
description:
Here is game 4/5 for Game-a-week with the theme physics engine. In this game you play as the sun while protecting the planets in your solar system. Manipulate your gravitational pull to guide your planets , however don't let them get too close because you'll engulf them in your flames. Each planets gains you one point per second so maintain them all as long as possible to get more points.

controls

-Q to quit

-mouse to move the sun

-LMB to increase your gravitational pull 

DISCLAIMER!!!

I do not own the song to this game, here is the source. All sounds effects were ripped from the song too
